mapper.sql: id, license_plate, user_id, max_capacity, recent_usage_time, usage_count
mapper.select: select id, license_plate as licensePlate, max_capacity as maxCapacity from truck where user_id = #{userId} order by recent_usage_time desc, usage_count desc
mapper.update: update truck set recent_usage_time = now(), usage_count = usage_count + 1 where id = #{id}
